Name: Singing in the Tranquil Court
Desc: An open, broad structure that combines a blue-toned glass dome and a golden frame for an elegant and bright look. The green tiles and the gray-white stones below give the common folk of Sumeru a genial impression, such that some researchers have called the two structural features the symbols of a "noble soul" and a "humble form" respectively. Though the original intent of such structures is unknown, researchers very much enjoy resting within them to calm themselves and ponder questions.
Source: Purchased from Battle Pass: Gnostic Chorus
